Class Drill

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.Component
org.mio.progettoingsoft.components.Drill
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoubleDrill
public class Drill extends Component
Represents a "Drill" component on a spaceship. Drills are used for combat or other actions requiring "fire power". Their effectiveness (fire power) depends on their current facing direction. This class extends the base Component class.

    • Drill

      public Drill(int id, Connector topConn, Connector bottomConn, Connector rightConn, Connector leftConn)
      Constructs a new Drill component with default front direction.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for this component.
      topConn - The connector on the top side of the component.
      bottomConn - The connector on the bottom side of the component.
      rightConn - The connector on the right side of the component.
      leftConn - The connector on the left side of the component.

    • Drill

      protected Drill(int id, ComponentType type, Connector topConn, Connector bottomConn, Connector rightConn, Connector leftConn)
      Protected constructor for subclasses that extend Drill (e.g., DoubleDrill).
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for this component.
      type - The specific ComponentType of the drill (e.g., DRILL, DOUBLE_DRILL).
      topConn - The connector on the top side of the component.
      bottomConn - The connector on the bottom side of the component.
      rightConn - The connector on the right side of the component.
      leftConn - The connector on the left side of the component.

  • Method Details

    • getDirection

      public Direction getDirection()
      Overrides the base method to return the current facing direction of the drill.
      Overrides:
      getDirection in class Component
      Returns:
      The Direction the drill is facing.

    • rotateClockwise

      public void rotateClockwise()
      Rotates the drill clockwise by 90 degrees. This method also calls the superclass's rotateClockwise method to handle any general component rotation logic. The direction cycles through FRONT -> RIGHT -> BACK -> LEFT -> FRONT.
      Overrides:
      rotateClockwise in class Component

    • getFirePower

      public float getFirePower(boolean actived)
      Calculates and returns the fire power provided by the drill.
      Overrides:
      getFirePower in class Component
      Parameters:
      actived - A boolean indicating whether the drill is activated. (Note: For a basic Drill, `actived` might not change the output, but it's provided for consistency with subclasses like DoubleDrill).
      Returns:
      The fire power: 1.0f if facing Direction.FRONT, otherwise 0.5f.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Provides a string representation of the Drill, including its inherited properties and its current direction.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Component
      Returns:
      A string containing component details and its direction.
